document.title: Introduction
document.paragraph:
1Introduction This section of the help deals with preferences related to a tool in particular. These preferences are distributed in three categories:
10_browsing_tools.xml Browsing tools preferences : They set some properties of the tools of the explorer bar (i.e. the left part of EiffelStudio development windows)
20_context_tools.xml Context tools preferences : They will be used to change properties of some of the contexttools.
30_editor/index.xml Editor preferences : They will allow you to customize some features of the editor, automatic completion in particular.
